Hi,
I'm pretty new to Heritrix 3 and despite my very good impression of the=
 code and it's ability, I'm having problems with a couple of things:

1. Ho=
w do I config the cxml file so I will crawl only in a specific domain, lets=
 say http://example.com and only in sub domains of it?
meaning if there is =
a url ads.google/.... i dont want to even fetch it.

2. How do i make the m=
ultiple queuing to work? does it happens automatically?

3. I configed the =
cxml file so I wont process all the jpg/gif/png files but my logs still sho=
w me (Mimetypes) i process them.  this is what I did:
<bean class=3D"org.ar=
chive.modules.deciderules.MatchesListRegexDecideRule">
          <property =
name=3D"decision" value=3D"REJECT"/>
     <!-- <property name=3D"listLogica=
lOr" value=3D"true" /> -->

        =
   <list>

what is my mistake??

Thanks a lot
